predicate.note: Frames file for 'attune' based on survey of sentences in ULA brown. No VerbNet entry, comparison with 'tune.'

example.name: Descriptive Usage
example.text: A brisk, amusing man, apparently constructed * on an ingenious system of spring-joints attuned *none* to the same peppery rhythm as his mind...
example.arg: to the same peppery rhythm as his mind
